events.title: Jogging
_comments: Dates will be in STR in ISO FORMAT new Date().toISOString)
ISO uses utc which is denoted by the Z
to start both servers w/ 1 command we need concurrently
use concurrently to run both processes:
-k if 1 process dies kill other process too.
_comments_on_commands: to POST: curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"title": "Learning TypeScript", "dateStart": "2020-60-27T14:17:07.500Z", "dateEnd": "2020-60-27T14:18:07.500Z"}' http://localhost:3001/events
// set to APP JSON BC we send data in JSON format
